MANAGEMENT CONSULTANT

SUMMARY

Human capital manager and operations strategist who works with cross-functional teams to translate organizational values and objectives into actions that drive impacts in local and cross-cultural contexts.
Highlights
Training and development Personnel records maintenance New hire orientation Exceptional interpersonal skills Innovative Cross-Cultural Mediation expertise Consensus building techniques Process improvement strategies Multi-site operations Systems implementation Flexible Self-motivated Market research and analysis Customer-oriented Strategic thinker Schedule management Problem resolution Deadline-oriented
Interviewing expertise Performance management strategies Manager coaching and training Event management Strategic planning Global and strategic sourcProject management Leadership/communication skills Product development Business operations organization ing NegotiationsProcedure development Analytical Team building Cost reduction and containment Staff motivation Group behavior and dynamics Outreach programming specialist Exceptional problem solver Articulate and well-spoken Time management Meticulous attention to detail Works well under pressure

ACCOMPLISHMENTS

Process Improvement
Oversaw implementation of new phone system which resulted in more cost-effective service.
Data Organization
Improved office organization by compiling quarterly budget reports, financial spreadsheets, organizational charts and company data reports using advanced Microsoft Excel functions.

TRAINING

Successfully trained staff in all office systems and databases, policies and procedures while focusing on minimizing errors and generating superior results.

Mentored and coached employees resulting in a 12% increase in productivity.

output_json.summary: Human capital manager and operations strategist with experience in cross-functional team management, process improvement, training, and project management.

description: Developed growth plans, identified key clients, targets, and service lines, generated business development awareness, offered feedback to executive management, directed strategic initiatives, and developed organizational change management strategies.

Managed multi-million co-operative budgets, identified strategic partnerships, generated revenues, managed projects, served as primary liaison, identified bottlenecks, implemented new processes, led cross-functional teams, tracked data, developed metrics, and improved company efficiency.

Accountable for business area, captured market share, managed team, spearheaded initiatives, strengthened business, implemented projects, created business plans, hired and trained staff, monitored budgets, developed best practices, and oversaw project launches.
Facilitated discussion group, pursued education, cultivated relationships, planned events, and communicated with local agencies.
